SAMARTH MURLIDHAR JAGAKAR
9833431924 | samarthjagakar2001@gmail.com
ï samarth-jagakar | § Samarth0809 |  SamarthJagakar
Dombivli, Maharashtra - 421202, India
OBJECTIVE
Aspiring Java Full Stack Developer with a solid foundation in Java, Spring Boot, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQL.
Seeking to contribute to dynamic development teams by building scalable, responsive web applications.
Passionate about developing end-to-end solutions, integrating robust backend services with intuitive front-end
interfaces to enhance user experience and deliver business value.
INTERNSHIP
• Techiolaza Innovations
December 2024 – Present
Java Developer & Flutter Developer
Thane, India
◦Helpinn: Designed and developed a cross-platform mobile application for hotel search, booking, and profile
management using Flutter and Dart.
◦Implemented real-time hotel search, wishlist management, booking flows, and user profile features, integrating
RESTful APIs and Firebase for authentication and data management.
PROJECTS
• NGO Website for Chetna Foundation
December 2024
Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Spring Boot, Razorpay Integration
§
◦Designed and developed a responsive and dynamic website for the Chetna Foundation NGO to enhance outreach
and engagement.
◦Implemented functional modules including an event gallery, volunteer registration, and contact forms.
◦Integrated Razorpay payment gateway for seamless and secure donation processing.

Review
Available to work in rotational shifts as required.
